/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees and buildings on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
